name: Add info about new Miro widgets to a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet
description: Every time a new widget is created in Miro, Make will automatically add it to a new row in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet. The template uses this [example worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AnDK8KmbvjyFkDW980V-0fFTzbkp?e=9ACxku).
